mapper.select: SELECT C_NEGOCIO, C_CANAL, C_OCENC FROM asl_ocenc WHERE c_negocio = 'F' AND c_canal = 'I' AND C_OCENC = '5000525041'
SELECT C_NEGOCIO, C_CANAL, C_OCENC FROM asl_ocenc WHERE c_negocio = 'F' AND c_canal = 'I' AND D_COLOCACION BETWEEN TO_DATE('2021-01-01','yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE('2021-06-01','yyyy-mm-dd')
